titleStmt.title: Eirēnogonia, or The pedegree of peace deliuered in a sermon intended to the iudges at the assises holden at Okeham in Rutland, Iuly 31. 1629. but after vpon an occasion, preached at Vppingham, in the same countie, Septemb. 6. 1629. By Antony Fawkner, Master of Arts, late student in Jesus Colledge at Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Fawkner, Antony, b. 1601 or 2.

titleStmt.title: Eirēnogonia, or The pedegree of peace deliuered in a sermon intended to the iudges at the assises holden at Okeham in Rutland, Iuly 31. 1629. but after vpon an occasion, preached at Vppingham, in the same countie, Septemb. 6. 1629. By Antony Fawkner, Master of Arts, late student in Jesus Colledge at Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Fawkner, Antony, b. 1601 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Robert Allott, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Beare,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
Running title reads: The pedegree of peace.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
